meanings.definition: The blank pages at the beginning and end of a book.
meanings.sent1: The endleafs of the book were untouched and pristine.
meanings.sent2: I always write my name on the endleafs of my favorite books.
meanings.sent3: The endleafs of the book felt lonely without any scribbles on them.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts filled the endleafs of the book, like whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The endleafs held the promise of unwritten stories within them.

meanings.definition: The outermost leaves of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The endleafs of the plant were turning a vibrant shade of red.
meanings.sent2: The endleafs of the flower were delicate and beautifully shaped.
meanings.sent3: The endleafs of the plant waved happily in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The endleafs of the tree danced in the sunlight, casting playful shadows.
meanings.sent5: The endleafs of the plant shimmered with morning dew, like tiny jewels.
